OnAppearing() OnAppearingApplication_Green_Quake.Views.ProfilePage.TopTabProfile Application_Green_Quake.Views.ProfilePage.TopTabProfileOnAppearing
override async void Application_Green_Quake.Views.ProfilePage.TopTabProfile.OnAppearing ( )[protected]
This function is called before the page is displayed. It displays the images as the criteria are met and also the bio and username. It also calulates the players level and progress and displays the progress to the next level on a progress bar.
